text: Francesco Pieri (3 June 1902, Acquapendente - 15 May 1961, Acquapendente) was an Italian Roman Catholic bishop. From 1941 to his death he was bishop of Orvieto. ==References== Category:1902 births Category:1961 deaths Category:20th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops of Orvieto Category:People from the Province of Viterbo
title: Francesco Pieri
